title: Whale Alert
shortDescription: Crypto‑whale tracking channel providing real‑time alerts on large blockchain transactions.
longDescription: Whale Alert is a Telegram channel for traders and crypto enthusiasts.  It monitors major cryptocurrency transactions and sends alerts about large transfers across Bitcoin, Ethereum and other networks.  Proxidize’s 2025 comparison of leading business channels notes that Whale Alert is a top professional channel because it tracks crypto transactions and helps traders follow market activity【35593890135280†L392-L401】.  The channel has tens of thousands of followers and is useful for anyone keeping an eye on the crypto‑whale movements.
